text: I am ccalling into some external C code, and have a crash in there; I'd like to debug this using lldb (a on macOS 10.14.6, Julia 1.5.3); but I can't seem to launch julia in lldb, nor attach to a running Julia process (via `lldb -p PID` -- how can I do this?

lldb -p PID
-- how can I do this?
